ThingDef.label: sleeping spot
ThingDef.description: Designates a spot on the ground where people should sleep. Not comfortable.

ThingDef.label: bed
ThingDef.description: A cozy mattress and sheets on a frame for resting.

ThingDef.label: double bed
ThingDef.description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people.

ThingDef.label: royal bed
ThingDef.description: A luxurious gold-inlaid bed fit for the highborn. Very comfy and beautiful. Fits two.

ThingDef.label: hospital bed
ThingDef.description: A bed specially designed for injured people. Improves chance of successful medical work.

ThingDef.label: bedroll
ThingDef.description: A simple bed that sits on the floor, usually made of cloth or leather, often lined with fur. It is lightweight and can be rolled up for easy transport, but it is not quite as comfortable as a typical bed.

ThingDef.label: double bedroll
ThingDef.description: A simple double-wide bed that sits on the floor, usually made of cloth or leather, often lined with fur. It is lightweight and can be rolled up for easy transport, but it is not quite as comfortable as a typical bed.

ThingDef.label: animal sleeping spot
ThingDef.description: Designates a spot on the ground where animals should sleep.

ThingDef.label: animal sleeping box
ThingDef.description: A small box for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats, or small dogs.

ThingDef.label: animal bed
ThingDef.description: A soft bed for animals to sleep on. Fits any animal.

ThingDef.label: stool
ThingDef.description: A simple platform on which to sit.

ThingDef.label: dining chair
ThingDef.description: A comfortable and attractive chair for sitting at a table.

ThingDef.label: armchair
ThingDef.description: A large, soft, comfy seat. Great for relaxation.

ThingDef.Name: TableBase
ThingDef.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.

ThingDef.label: end table
ThingDef.description: A small bedside table. Makes the nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to their head. Placing more than one end table near the same bed will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: table (1x2)
ThingDef.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.

ThingDef.label: table (2x2)
ThingDef.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.

ThingDef.label: table (2x4)
ThingDef.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.

ThingDef.label: table (3x3)
ThingDef.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.

ThingDef.label: plant pot
ThingDef.description: Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby.

ThingDef.label: torch lamp
ThingDef.description: A wooden torch for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with wood. Produces a small amount of heat.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (red)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in red.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (green)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in green.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (blue)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in blue.

ThingDef.label: sun lamp
ThingDef.description: Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.

ThingDef.label: shelf
ThingDef.description: Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.label: dresser
ThingDef.description: Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed will have no effect.
